text: Samuel H. Smith may refer to: *Samuel H. Smith (educator) (born 1940), president of Washington State University, 1985–2000 *Samuel H. Smith (Latter Day Saints) (1808–44), Book of Mormon witness, missionary, and brother of Joseph Smith, Jr. *Samuel H. Smith (politician) (born 1955), member of Pennsylvania House of Representatives *Samuel Harrison Smith (printer), American journalist and newspaper publisher, founded the National Intelligencer ==See also== *Sam Smith (disambiguation)
title: Samuel H. Smith
